name: smelting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act or process of getting a metal from rock by heating it to a very high temperature, or of melting objects made from metal in order to use the metal to make something new: Iron mining and smelting reached their peak during the second half of the nineteenth century. The mining and smelting released lead and other dangerous metals into the river basin. See
smelt
More examplesFewer examplesArsenic is found at high concentrations in mining states and other areas heavy with copper smelting.Aluminium smelting consumes thousands of megawatts of electricity.A gang has attacked a number of smelting operations and seized numerous gold bars.
